name: Slash command auto-complete works as expected in DM Channels
precondition: Note: Requires test demo plugin build here: https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-plugin-demo/tree/MM-20684-Plugin-Autocomplete-Implementation

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
1. Install ToDo plugin
2. Open a DM with any user
3. Type /todo and select add form the options list
4. Type an item such as "tie my shoes" to add to your list and send the command
5. Send the command
inline.expectedResult: Slash command auto-complete is visible in DM
